revised_title: Zoological Observations of Alcyonarian Species in North Celebes
tldr: The author examines an Alcyonarian species found in North Celebes and compares its anatomy and growth patterns to those of Tubipora and Syringopora. The study reveals similarities between the Alcyonarian and Syringopora, supporting the classification of Syringopora as an Alcyonarian, and suggests that Tubipora should be united with the Cornularidae into a group called Stolonifera.
